name: Jingle Genesis - The Birth of a JingleCats
name_original: Jingle Genesis - The Birth of a JingleCats
description:
An adventure game about the true cost of the beloved international delight.

Lewis always says it's important for a Jingle Cats to get weird at the end. I think this one is pretty cool.

Should take a person less than 30 minutes to play through: maybe don't play it if you're trying to get through as many Jingle Cats as possible :)
